overview: Can you imagine being taken into the hospital via ambulance after a terrible accident only to find out that the facility is run by 101 hot and horny nurses that only want to use you for your services? No, not your insurance...your DICK! For them you serve one purpose and one purpose only...fuck the shit out of all 101 of them before you can get released! I guess the real question becomes do you ever want to get released? Probably not, because you're the World's Luckiest Patient EVER!!
title: World's Luckiest Patient with 101 Nurses
